sources.title: RBC Bearings, Inc. - EverybodyWiki Bios & Wiki
sources.snippet: RBC Bearings Inc (Roller Bearing Company of America) was founded in 1919. In 1992, RBC acquired Transport Dynamics (founded in 1955) located in southern California. In 1993, Heim® Bearings also became part of the RBC family. Then in 2000, Schaublin SA based in Delémont, Switzerland were acquired as well.
